response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe is a generous offer considering its worth to both parties. We understand the importance of making a decision that aligns with your financial situation and long-term goals. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
